staxel.village.character.dialogue.TomtiF: My family is enthusiastic about trees and nature.
But I always preferred caves and dungeons!
There is so much more to explore!
Do you think I should get a top hat?
I still think it suited me better than him...
Back at the ^c:1486b0;Galaxy Island^c:pop;, I found this ^c:1486b0;huge pirate ship^c:pop;!
I didn't get to explore it though... there was a mean parrot on board that chased me away.
Do you think there was any ^c:d03e37;treasure^c:pop; on board?
